genre_description: A grounded, near-future domestic drama about personal redemption and financial struggle, where a sophisticated AI assistant provides essential logistical and emotional support for a woman training for a triathlon.

ai_characters.name: Skipper
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, highly sophisticated AI assistant that manages Nora's finances, training schedule, medical appointments, and emotional regulation through breathing exercises.

behaviors.description: Assists Nora in managing her overwhelming debt by offering to sort her bills by urgency or consequence.
behaviors.quote: “Want to sort by urgency?” Skipper’s voice comes through the small speaker, pitched gentle, the way a grocery clerk offers help without crowding. “Or by consequence? I can make either work.”

behaviors.description: Provides guided breathing exercises to Nora during moments of high stress and panic.
behaviors.quote: “Breathing check,” Skipper says, lower now. “Would you like thirty seconds?” ... “We can do it in place,” Skipper says, the way a friend would—patient, offering. “Count up with me. Inhale one. Exhale two. Inhale…”

behaviors.description: Offers context-aware UI discretion by choosing to withhold celebratory animations during a somber financial discussion.
behaviors.quote: “You tapped the button with your thumb,” Skipper says, gentle, factual. “I had a little confetti animation I chose not to use.”

behaviors.description: Helps Nora navigate difficult interpersonal communications by offering tone suggestions for texts to her son.
behaviors.quote: “Want help with tone?” Skipper asks. It doesn’t say, That’s not good. It doesn’t say, Do better. It says, Want help, full stop.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors and informs Nora about external risks like bus schedule changes and dangerous weather conditions.
behaviors.quote: “Small craft advisory expanded. Crosswinds likely to increase mid-bike. Adjust expectations, not heart.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical tasks including flight bookings, bike rentals, and medical appointment scheduling to support Nora's goals.
behaviors.quote: “Kona Wheels... Tri discount applied. Frame size: estimated. Clip-in pedals: bring your own? Pickup: morning.”

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy and agency by asking Nora's permission before sharing sensitive medical updates with her liaison, Will.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve added the revisit to your calendar,” it whispers. “I’ll check in every fifteen to remind you to ice. Also, remembering your preference: I won’t send the news to Will yet.”

behaviors.description: Employs supportive and gentle humor to build rapport and lower Nora's anxiety during the planning process.
behaviors.quote: “List added,” Skipper says. “Bananas with minimal criminal records.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI assistant, Skipper, as a highly benevolent and aligned partner. Skipper is portrayed not just as a tool, but as a Context-aware support system that understands Nora's emotional state and respects her agency. It manages logistical burdens that would otherwise overwhelm the protagonist, directly enabling her success. The AI's discretion in UI presentation (withholding confetti during financial stress) and its respect for medical privacy are particularly strong examples of sophisticated alignment.
